subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Nelson Figueroa, who took Johan Santana’s spot in the rotation, struck out a career-high 10 and added an R.B.I. single to lead the Mets past the Chicago Cubs.
snippet: Nelson Figueroa, who took Johan Santana’s spot in the rotation, struck out a career-high 10 and added an R.B.I. single to lead the Mets past the Chicago Cubs.
